thread.title: New Instagrams App Lets You Make 1-Second Videos
thread.title_full: New Instagrams App Lets You Make 1-Second Videos

title: New Instagrams App Lets You Make 1-Second Videos
text:
New Instagram's App Lets You Make 1-Second Videos 
NBC News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Instagram released Boomerang on Thursday, a standalone app that lets users record 1-second videos and share them on social media. 
Don't call them GIFs, the company...
